"Mischief Symbol":
"During this Seasonal Event, an unusual holographic symbol called a \"Mischief Symbol\" will appear around Central City.

You will also receive limited-time Tasks that ask you to find the Mischief Symbol."

"During this Seasonal Event, unusual holographic symbols called \"Mischief Symbols\" will appear in Exploration Sections.

You will also receive limited-time Tasks that ask you to find these Mischief Symbols.

You can locate Mischief Symbols by using your Mag Sonar."

"During this Seasonal Event, unusual holographic symbols called \"Mischief Symbols\" will appear in Exploration Sections across all Regions.

You will also receive limited-time Tasks that ask you to find these Mischief Symbols.

You can locate Mischief Symbols by using your Mag Sonar."

"During this Seasonal Event, the \"Mischief Symbol\" holographics found in all regions will differ from their usual appearance.

You can locate Mischief Symbols by using your Mag Sonar."

"シーズナルイベント期間中は、
リテムリージョンの特定の探索セクションに
通常のホログラフィックとは異なる
“ミスチーフシンボル”が出現します。

ミスチーフシンボルはマグの“アクティブソナー”で探すことができます。"
